Hello! I have a non-registered dependency for a package that  I depend from. My test script also depends from this package. If I explicitely add the package to the test dependency (`]activate test` and then `]add <http://github.com/|github.com/>…`) I get the error `can not merge projects` when running `]test` . If I don't add the dependency to the "test" project, julia tells me I should. Any idea what I'm doing wrong?
*bonus question* is should `test`  have its own `Project.toml`  or not?
